attributes.action: Increase the penalty for using a mobile phone whilst driving,from three points to a Six or Twelve Month Ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following a survey by the AA, recent media attention and a Minister of the Crown being caught driving whilst using a mobile phone. Is it not time that the penalty was increased to a six or twelve month ban.As the current deterrent does not seem to be working.
